name: VILE (itch) (ordinaryglitch)
description:
VILE is a turn-based combat game made in Twine. You play as a young witch that helps people cure diseases caused by demons using magical cards. 

Currently available cards:

Rogue — the most agile card class that easily dodges most attacks. Equipped with a dagger, it deals a lot of damage to its foes with quick and accurate cuts. However, its composure is very fragile.

Knight — a strong warrior protected by durable armor. This card has the strongest composure and is able to block most attacks. However, its own attacks aren't very powerful.

Pyromancer — the most unpredictable class. This card has a weak composure, but its fire magic is incredibly strong. Successful consecutive attacks can easily obliterate any foe.
